name: BrainZ: The Remake
description:
The Story

The year was 2013. A little Eroxxie had recently got his hands on the engine Game Maker and wanted to make a zombie game. It would late become BrainZ.
BrainZ is my first ever published game on the internet and since it was my first published project in Game Maker, the result was a bit faulty.

Now, 5 years later, its remake gets many of its idea i had back in the days thanks to me getting better in Game Maker development and game design.

BrainZ: The Remake uses the same gameplay as its original game with you trying to survive a horde of zombies. Survive as long as possible until they kill you (the original game didnt have a healthbar. Be thankful that i gave you one in this game)!
I might update the game further with new content and improvements, but i wanted to stay as close as possible to the original game!
The game uses the Game Jolt API, but it can be played without login in, unless you want to log in to earn some nice trophies (on Game Jolt)!

If you still want to try my first game, which was never made into a executable file unfortunately, you can find it here at Game Maker Steam workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=199790405

Controls

  • WASD: Movement
  • Space: Fire gun
  • R: Reload
